BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.ROM.rom#
BlackBox.type:
rom# :: KnownNat n      -- ARG[0]
      => Clock tag       -- clk,  ARG[1]
      -> Enable tag      -- en,   ARG[2]
      -> Vec n a         -- init, ARG[3]
      -> Signal tag Int  -- rd,   ARG[4]
      -> Signal tag a
BlackBox.template:
-- rom begin
~GENSYM[~COMPNAME_rom][0] : block
  signal ~GENSYM[ROM][1] : ~TYP[3];
  signal ~GENSYM[rd][2]  : integer range 0 to ~LIT[0]-1;
begin
  ~SYM[1] <= ~LIT[3];

  ~SYM[2] <= to_integer(~ARG[4])
  -- pragma translate_off
                mod ~LIT[0]
  -- pragma translate_on
                ;
  ~IF ~ISENABLED[2] ~THEN
  ~GENSYM[romSync][5] : process (~ARG[1])
  begin
    if (rising_edge(~ARG[1])) then
      if ~ARG[2] then~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
        ~RESULT <= ~FROMBV[~SYM[1](~SYM[2])][~TYPO]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;~ELSE
        ~RESULT <= ~SYM[1](~SYM[2])
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;~FI
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~ELSE
  ~SYM[5] : process (~ARG[1])
  begin
    if (rising_edge(~ARG[1])) then~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
      ~RESULT <= ~FROMBV[~SYM[1](~SYM[2])][~TYPO]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;~ELSE
      ~RESULT <= ~SYM[1](~SYM[2])
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;~FI
    end if;
  end process;~FI
end block;
-- rom end
